name: Fries Gangster
description:
===STORY===

 IN THE YEAR XXXX, THE GOVERNMENT DECIDED TO BANNED FRENCH FRIES , BECAUSE IT KILLS LOT OF PEOPLE WITH CHOLESTROL.

 SO FRENCH FRIES BECAME EXTREMELY RARE,AND SOME PEOPLE TRIED TO SMUGGLE THEM AND MADE A LOT OF MONEY. 

WORK YOUR WAY TO BECOME THE MOST SUCCESSFUL FRIES SMUGGLER IN THE COUNTRY

===GAMEPLAY===

THIS GAME COMBINE SIMULATION AND "SNAKE" GAME MECHANIC.

YOU HAVE TO HARVEST POTATO AND STEAL OIL THEN MAKE FRIES OUT OF THEM THEN SELL TO BLACK MARKET.

===HOW TO PLAY===

JUST USE LEFT MOUSE TO TURN LEFT AND RIGHT MOUSE TO TURN RIGHT

WHEN HARVEST POTATO AND STEALING OIL

===STORY IDEA===

IMAGINE BOARDWALK EMPIRE BUT YOU SMUGGLED FRENCH FRIES
